questions.question: What is Lucent?
questions.answer: Lucent is a mindful Pomodoro app designed to help you focus, stay balanced, and build consistent productivity habits through structured work and break sessions.

questions.question: Can I use Lucent on multiple devices?
questions.answer: Yes! Your Lucent account syncs seamlessly across all your devices — keeping your focus sessions, statistics, and progress perfectly aligned.

questions.question: Does Lucent work offline?
questions.answer: Absolutely. You can start and complete your focus sessions even without an internet connection. Once you're back online, all your data will automatically sync.

questions.question: Can I customize my focus sessions?
questions.answer: Of course! You can adjust session duration, break times, and even create custom modes like Study, Work, or Meditation to fit your daily routine.

questions.question: Does Lucent integrate with Apple Health?
questions.answer: Yes. When enabled, your focus time will be logged as Mindful Minutes in Apple Health — helping you track your mental wellness alongside productivity.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Your information is stored securely with end-to-end encryption. Lucent never shares or sells your personal data.

questions.question: What if I need help or have feedback?
questions.answer: Our support team is always here to help via in-app feedback or email. You can also explore our quick-start guide and community tips directly within the app.
